generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved street with visible tram tracks and road markings, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: Pedestrian areas are visible along the sides of the street, separated from the road by curbs and poles, indicating sidewalks.
- building: Multiple multi-story buildings line both sides of the street, including commercial establishments.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- traffic light: Red traffic lights are visible at the intersections on the right side of the image.
- traffic sign: A traffic sign is visible on the right side of the image, near the traffic light.
- vegetation: Trees are visible in the distance along the street.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings, appearing overcast.
- person: Multiple pedestrians are visible walking on the sidewalks and crossing the street.
- rider: A person is riding a bicycle in the middle of the road.
- car: A car is visible in the middle of the road, behind the cyclist.
- bicycle: Several bicycles are parked on the sidewalk and being ridden on the road.
